textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from April 2008 to May 2012. PostDoc on face recognition. Involved in the project MOBIO and TABULA RASA. After 4 years at Idiap, Chris is finally going back to Australia where he obtained a research position. Chris was a real asset to the team, and I will never be able to thank him so much for its great work during MOBIO and more recently for his investigations on Session Variability Modeling, Joint Factor Analysis and Probabilistic Linear Discriminant Analysis.
